CHAT.comment: SYNGENTA CROP PROTECTION, INC., ROBERT BABB, EDEE TEMPLET, AND KENNETH A. DEVUN, Petitioners v. HURLEY HENSON.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF HENRY B. ALSOBROOK, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID J. BEDERMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF HENRY B. ALSOBROOK, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 10:43 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
